name: swoopit
description: easy access to swoop events in popup, Extension for Startup weekend challenge (#swgoogleio).
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://cbks0.googleapis.com https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com https://mts0.googleapis.com https://mts1.googleapis.com; object-src 'self'
